name: Dogfight Chronicles
description:
It's a space dogfight! Outmaneuver the AI and shoot down its ship to claim victory. Afterwards, check out the Battle Log for a graphical representation of the fight.

Controls:

  • Asteroids-style controls (left / right rotates, up accelerates, down decelerates)
  • One fire button
  • Keyboard: WASD or arrow keys to maneuver, spacebar or left-click to fire
  • Controller: Dpad or left stick to maneuver, face buttons, triggers, or bumpers to fire

Design and programming:

  • Scott Hiroshige

External Art and Audio

  • Spaceship and health pip sprites
  • Star fields
  • Sound effects
  • Music
  • Abstract and Press Start K fonts
